content.value: Today I'm slightly disappointed with @monzo for not providing an easy way for us to see the account's IBAN. Their official recommendation is to look for an IBAN calculator online, but I know better than to insert my account details on random websites in the internet.
content.html: Today I'm slightly disappointed with @monzo for not providing an easy way for us to see the account's IBAN. Their official recommendation is to look for an IBAN calculator online, but I know better than to insert my account details on random websites in the internet.
